title: How do I lock a message in a conversation or delete a conversation?
answer:
![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110527)

 To lock a message, select a conversation, press and hold the message, and choose Lock from the shortcut menu. 

 To delete a conversation, press and hold the conversation and choose Delete from the shortcut menu.
